attributes.action: bring back Children's A&E and maternity services back to Southport & Formby District Hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We in Southport would like the Prime Minister to reinstate the Children's A&E and Maternity services that were moved to Ormskirk. After the resent death of a 4 day old baby this has never a better reason to bring the services back to a town which sees millions of family's and children visiting each year! This is a tourist town and we need these services back now!

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to bring back Children's A&E and maternity services back to Southport & Formby District Hospital.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=southportcare
